Class UserInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInput

  • public class UserInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles reading numbers entered by the user to the console.

    Should prevent crashes caused by the user entering letters where numbers should be but may easily be stuck in an endless loop of the user trying to input wrong values and the system not accepting them.

    Author:
    frantisekpavlica

    • Method Detail

      • nextInt

        public static int nextInt()
        Tries to read an integer from the console. If it fails because an invalid value was entered, it prompts the user to try again until a valid integer is entered.
        Returns:
        The integer that is read successfully from the nextInt() method of Scanner.

        Returns:
